articles.author: Kate Brady, Ellen Francis
articles.title: Germany approves massive spending package to boost defense - The Washington Post
articles.description: The move comes as Europe scrambles to strengthen its security amid concerns over U.S. commitments under President Donald Trump.
articles.content:
BERLIN German lawmakers passed a mammoth spending plan Tuesday that could allow for up to $1 trillion in defense and infrastructure investments over the next decade.
